Plugin.Details: This plugin provides detector for SLF4J

Detector.Details: Finds message format which has wrong format string.
Finds illegal class which is passed to LoggerFactory#getLogger(Class)
Finds log which uses message returned from Throwable#getMessage and Throwable#getLocalizedMessage.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: Count of placeholder is not equal to count of parameter
BugPattern.LongDescription: Count of placeholder({5}) is not equal to count of parameter({4})
BugPattern.Details: Count of placeholder should equal to count of parameter.

BugPattern.LongDescription: Format should be constant. Use placeholder to reduce the needless cost of parameter construction. see http://www.slf4j.org/faq.html#logging_performance
BugPattern.Details: Format should be constant. Use placeholder to reduce the needless cost of parameter construction. see official FAQ.

BugPattern.LongDescription: Using unknown array as parameter. You cannot use array which is provided as method argument or returned from other method, for better static analysis by findbugs-slf4j.
BugPattern.Details: Using unknown array as parameter. You cannot use array which is provided as method argument or returned from other method, for better static analysis by findbugs-slf4j.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: Log format should contain non-sign character
BugPattern.LongDescription: To make log readable, log format ({4}) should contain non-sign character.
BugPattern.Details: To make log readable, log format should contain non-sign character.

BugPattern.LongDescription: To prevent illegal usage, logger should be private field. Change this field ({0}) to private field.
BugPattern.Details: To prevent illegal usage, logger should be private field.

BugPattern.LongDescription: Logger should be final field. Change this field ({0}) to final field.
Logger should be non-static field. Change this field ({0}) to non-static field.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: Illegal class is passed to LoggerFactory#getLogger(Class)
BugPattern.LongDescription: Illegal class is passed to LoggerFactory#getLogger(Class). It should be one of {0}.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: Do not have to use message returned from Throwable#getMessage and Throwable#getLocalizedMessage.
BugPattern.LongDescription: Do not have to use message returned from Throwable#getMessage and Throwable#getLocalizedMessage. It is enough to provide throwable instance as the last argument, then binding will log its message.
BugPattern.Details: Do not have to use message returned from Throwable#getMessage and Throwable#getLocalizedMessage.
